title: D5 Semi-Experienced AD LFT
body:
As the title says,
I've been a regular player since season 2. During S4 and S5 I played for a few ranked teams in Challenger and participated in online and IRL tournaments. 
Took a break during S6 and started again in S7. 
Looking to get back into the scene. 
Am available all nights and a few days during the day too. Got discord + Skype
Message me in game if interested!

Cheers
